title: Choosing an AI License Allocation Model: How to Decide Who Gets Access First
summary: How many licenses should you buy, and who gets them first? Explore five allocation models—from lottery to behavior-based—and the guiding principles for maximizing AI adoption velocity

summary: A small fraction of employees generates 5-10× more AI usage. Learn how to find them, learn from them, and scale what works

summary: Bake measurement into every adoption workstream to go from generic enablement to targeted interventions that shift real behavior

title: ROI Demands Patience
summary: AI value unfolds in stages. Focusing on ROI prematurely can lead to missed opportunities. Here's what to focus on instead

title: What Early AI Adoption Really Looks Like in the Enterprise
summary: Early adoption is concentrated in few surfaces and within a small set of superusers, and this is ok

title: The Tipping Point For Habit Formation
summary: When users reach 11-15 AI actions per week, experimentation becomes habit. Learn how to accelerate your users to this critical threshold
